input: I am treating a patient with severe malaria who has an acute kidney injury due to their disease severity. We do not have artesunate in stock and we cant do dialysis here, we only have quinine in a parenteral solution. How should I adjust the dosage for Quinine in this patient?

My 8 years old children female patient was recently diagnosed with TB and TB meningitis. She has improved since starting her TB treatment 3 weeks ago, but she was also diagnosed with HIV, can I start her ART now?

When two providers are resuscitating a neonate who isn't breathing within one minute after birth and the heartrate is 30-40 beats per minute should we assist ventilation and do chest compressions or just ventilate?
